title: (x) Lucida at large sizes
content:
help!   
we've got a logo in Lucida which we've been asked to produce large (signage). it looks terrible at a large size. Does anyone know of a font similar to Lucida which is actually smooth / looks good at a large size?   
Is Lucida just a crappy typeface or could it be the version we have?   
any suggestions gratefully accepted   
cheers
author: aleen

comments.content:
Hi, Aleen,   
   
Maybe you dislike Lucida at big sizes because it was designed to work fine on low resolution laser printers and other adverse (small) situations.
